activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: The mince m'ea't is in the cold room.
This deep- fr'ee'zer is too heavy.
The basmati rice is st'ea'ming in the pot.

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_b: It is in the pencil case.

dialogues.text_a: Where is the assistant baker now?
dialogues.text_b: He is in the fermentation room.
It is in the large mixing bowl.
They are in the cake preparation room.
It is  in the gas oven.
They are in the cold store.

activity_1_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

examples.sentence:
The correct baking time for small bread rolls is 15–18 minutes. The baking time for these rolls is 22 minutes.

The baking time for these rolls is ………………….

content.sentence:
The range of the oven temperature for baking buns is 180–190 degrees Celsius. The temperature in this oven is 160 degrees Celsius.

The temperature in this oven is ………………….

The correct weight of the dough for a batch is 2 kilograms. The weight of this dough is 2.3 kilograms.

The weight of this dough is ………………….

The acceptable sugar content in syrup is 10–12 percent. The sugar content in this syrup is 14 percent.

The sugar content in this syrup is ………………….

The standard moisture level of flour is 12–14 percent. The moisture level of this flour is 18 percent.

The moisture level of this flour is ………………….

The ideal fermentation time for bread dough is 2–3 hours. The fermentation time for this dough is 4 hours.

 The fermentation time for this dough is ………………….

The safe cold storage temperature for dairy products is 2–4 degrees Celsius. This cold storage room temperature is 6 degrees Celsius.

 This cold storage room temperature is ………………….

The recommended depth of batter in the tray is 2 centimeters. The batter in this tray is 3.5 centimeters deep.

 The batter in this tray is ………………….

The standard weight of a pastry sheet is 500 grams. The pastry sheet in this batch is 650 grams.

 The pastry sheet in this batch is ………………….

The correct oil content in fried snacks is 8–10 percent. The oil content in these snacks is 13 percent.

 The oil content in these snacks is ………………….

The acceptable moisture level for bread dough is between 60% and 65%. The moisture level of this  bread dough is 70 %.

 The moisture level of this bread dough is ………………….

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the question before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்வியைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_d.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: What is the temperature in the oven?
What is the correct temperature range for baking cinnamon buns?
What should be the correct weight of the dough?
What is the correct reading of the moisture meter?
Where is the record book kept?

activity_b.text: I am checking the temperature of the gas oven
I am checking the length of the bread loaf.
I am checking the depth of the mixing bowl.
I am checking the width of the baking tray.
I am checking the sugar content of the syrup.
The dough is about 150 grams. –The dough is about 150 grams too much.
The pastry sheet is about 5 centimeters.  The pastry sheet is about 5 centimeters too long
The baking tray is about 3 centimeters. The baking tray is about 3 centimeters too wide.
The mixing bowl is about 2 centimeters.The mixing bowl is about 2 centimeters too deep.
The gas oven is about 20 degrees. The gas oven is about 20 degrees too hot.
